title: Winterfest featuring Cookies and Cocoa with Santa - Saturday, December 6, 2025
text:
HomeCommunitySpecial Events- Winterfest featuring Cookies & Cocoa with Santa
Winterfest featuring Cookies & Cocoa with Santa
Saturday, December 6, 2025, 3:30 - 6:30 p.m.
2 locations: Fort Lupton Public & School Library, 370 S. Rollie Ave. & the Fort Lupton Recreation Center, 203 S. Harrison Ave.
2 locations, twice the fun! With a new twist to our annual event, Winterfest featuring Cookies & Cocoa with Santa, will be at the Fort Lupton Public & School Library and at the Fort Lupton Recreation Center. The Polar Express trolley will run between the Library and Rec. Center all evening.
-
Christy Romano
Events CoordinatorPhone:720.928.4071
3:30 pm - 4:00 pm: Santa starts the event by reading The Polar Express at the library. Enjoy crafts, cookies & cocoa at the library from 3:30 pm - 6:30 pm.
4:00 pm: Santa arrives at the Rec. Center! Enjoy photo's with Santa (taken with your phone), 3 additional family photo stations, carnival games, bounce houses, the Fort Lupton Polar Express trolley, and more!
This event is FREE to the community!
